about.name: Manoj
about.title: Aspiring Frontend Developer | B.Tech 2nd Year Student
about.bio: I'm a 2nd year B.Tech student passionate about creating beautiful, user-friendly web experiences. My journey in web development started during my first year of college, and I've been constantly learning and improving my skills since then.
about.longBio:
As a Computer Science student at Vishnu Institue of Technology, I've developed a strong foundation in programming fundamentals and software development practices. My interest in frontend development was sparked by the perfect blend of creativity and technical challenge it offers. I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive designs.

When I'm not coding or learning new technologies, you can find me playing basketball, reading tech blogs, or contributing to open-source projects. I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations!
